sentences: Mayumi Gojo (五條 真由美, Gojō Mayumi, born February 12, 1972) is a Japanese singer from Ibaraki Prefecture.
Currently she is affiliated with the Love&Light talent management agency.
She was introduced by her voice trainer to the late Miki Matsubara, who offered her to sing an insert song for the 1999 anime series Ojamajo Doremi.
"Natsu no Mahou" (Split single with Maho-dou, released July 4, 2001)
